price: 28. Tidakkah kamu memperhatikan orang-orang yang telah menukar nikmat Allah dengan ingkar kepada Allah dan menjatuhkan kaumnya ke lembah kebinasaan?,
arabic: ۞ أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ بَدَّلُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ كُفۡرٗا وَأَحَلُّواْ قَوۡمَهُمۡ دَارَ ٱلۡبَوَارِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna baddalū niʿ'mata al-lahi kuf'ran wa-aḥallū qawmahum dāra al-bawāri
